subject: Sexual Health
title: Asymptomatic Infections
description: A quick, practical guide to Asymptomatic Infections.

hook.text: The most dangerous STI is the one you don't know you have. Many infections hide in plain sight.

buildup.text: Chlamydia shows no symptoms in about 70% of women and 50% of men who are infected.

discovery.text: Asymptomatic carriers unknowingly pass infections to partners, fueling silent epidemics.

twist.text: Even without symptoms, these infections can cause lasting damage like infertility or organ harm.

climax.text: Routine screening is the only reliable way to catch infections that produce no visible warning signs.

punchline.text: No symptoms does not mean no infection.

quiz.question: What percentage of women with chlamydia show no symptoms?
